text: Ismail I (17 July 1487 â€“ 23 May 1524), was the Shah of the Safavid dynasty of Persia until his death in 1524. He started the Safavid dynasty and was the effective founder who went on to unite all of Iranic people for 1st time since the Sassanids and establish Shia Islam as the main religion. title: Ismail I
